title: Add 'shape type' as a subcategory

requirements.text: Create a new subcategory named 'shape type' under the '3d print' parent category in the backend category hierarchy

quotes: Add shape type as a subcategorie

acceptanceCriteria: A subcategory with name 'shape type' exists under the '3d print' parent category
The subcategory is automatically created during canister initialization/upgrade if it does not already exist
The subcategory appears in the CategorySelector dropdown under '3d print'
The subcategory appears in the CategoryFilter component hierarchy under '3d print'
Products can be assigned to the 'shape type' subcategory through the upload interfaces

requirements.text: Update the migration module to ensure the 'shape type' subcategory is created under '3d print' during canister upgrades if it does not already exist

quotes: Add shape type as a subcategorie

acceptanceCriteria: The migration.mo file includes logic to check for and create the 'shape type' subcategory under '3d print'
The migration preserves existing 'shape type' subcategory if it already exists
The migration runs automatically during canister upgrade

constraints: The subcategory must be created under the '3d print' parent category specifically
Follow the existing pattern in migration.mo for creating preset categories
Maintain the single-actor architecture with all logic in backend/main.mo
nonGoals: Changing the existing category management functionality
